name: Tumblr - No More Special Logos
description:
Removes any special icons or sponsoring near the Tumblr Logo.
NEW: REMOVES FESTIVUS SPONSORING BY SEINFELD

user.name: Sorcerer
user.about:
I just like to change how the web looks.
You're free to modify my styles, just attribute me.
Please email me if any of my styles are broken/out of date so I can fix them.
